item.title: New Wave playlist for 12/2015
item.description: Including: Airkraft, Bruce Cockburn, Christmas Wrapping, Lene Lovich, Marshall Crenshaw, Slam Bamboo, Suburban Lawns, Ukw, Wall Of Voodoo.

item.description: Including: Cabaret Voltaire, Devo, Kraftwerk, Laurie Anderson, Men At Work, Models, Plastic Bertrand, Robert Palmer, Synth Britannia, The Passions.

item.description: Including: A Flock Of Seagulls, Delia Haunt, Ffs, Ken Synthrock, Level 42, Strawberry Switchblade, The Roaring Boys, Theoretical Girls, Thompson Twins, 大貫妙子 (Taeko Onuki).
